subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Nick Zito, a Hall of Fame trainer, will learn Saturday whether he has a player for the Kentucky Derby when Frammento runs in the Fountain of Youth Stakes.
snippet: Nick Zito, a Hall of Fame trainer, will learn Saturday whether he has a player for the Kentucky Derby when Frammento runs in the Fountain of Youth Stakes.
